hooks.command:
FILE_PATH=$(cat | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$FILE_PATH" ]; then DIR=$(dirname "$FILE_PATH"); BRANCH=$(git -C "$DIR" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ "$BRANCH" = "main" ]; then echo "BLOCKED: You are on the main branch. Create a worktree first:

  git worktree add ../Orbit-feature-name -b feature/feature-name
  cd ../Orbit-feature-name

See CLAUDE.md for the full workflow." >&2; exit 2; fi; fi
